nodes.bodyText:
s/proivde/provide
Also, please pass in the value they provided and include it in the message. "The stack-size value of %d bytes for IO worker %s is low and may result in problems. A value of at least 150,000 is recommended."
Also this needs the @LogMessage annotation and the method return type should be 'void'. That's how methods that produce log messages are handled. Methods without that are not for log messages; they return objects that include localized strings and then the code that calls the method does something with the object.
Thank you for the review :) I have changed it accordingly.
